mapper.select: select id,name,phone,email,address from member where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, phone=#{phone},email=#{email},address=#{address} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into review (re_no, re_id, re_ex, re_star, re_file1, re_file2) values (#{no}, #{id}, #{ex}, #{star}, #{file1}, #{file2})
